description:
Located in Fort Worth, Texas, Barrow Law is dedicated to helping individuals and families recover the compensation and benefits they need after suffering an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence or wrongdoing. Serving the Fort Worth metro area as well as all of Tarrant County, our law firm focuses solely on personal injury claims, and our attorneys provide quality, effective representation to those affected by any of the following:

  • All types of motor vehicle accidents, including car, motorcycle and 18-wheeler accidents
  • Pedestrian and bicycle accidents
  • Wrongful death
  • Slip-and-fall accidents and other premises liability claims
  • Oil and gas industry accidents and other worksite injuries
  • Insurance claim disputes
  • Defective products
  • Dog bites and animals attacks
  • Traumatic brain injuries
  • Serious personal injuries
  • Sexual assault and molestation

Founded by attorney Wade Barrow, our law firm is devoted to protecting the rights and entitlements of accident victims. By using the latest in legal technology combined with our more than 15 years of legal experience, we can help ensure you receive the maximum amount of restitution to which you are entitled for your injury or loss, while we work to hold the responsible parties accountable for their actions.

For caring and competent counsel from an attorney who has your best interests at heart, you can count on Barrow Law to aggressively advocate on your behalf. To find out more about how we can help you in your time of need, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
